title: Ep 211 | Jase Discovers Flash Mobs, Phil Finds Hot Wind at Church, and Falling in Love with Jesus
description:
Jase attends a wedding that includes a flash mob, but he doesn't know what it is. He also reveals that he loves weddings for reasons you might not expect. Phil and Jase discuss the bride of Christ and compare spiritual marriage to your union with your spouse. Jase is the most nervous he's been in years when he finds out that Missy has been listening to the podcast. The guys talk about falling in love with Jesus, Holy Spirit symbolism in the Bible, and the true meaning of Acts. And Phil is seeing plenty of hot wind in church buildings but not a whole lot of fire.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
